answers.answer: I think this may have ended up in the wrong forum. Perhaps it should have gone to the pregnancy forum? Let me know if this posting was a mistake of the website. Thanks.

question: I'm 19 weeks pregnant and the doctors are finding glucose and protien in my urine...it won't be for another two weeks before they make me drink something and take blood work to see if I have diabetes...what do I do in the meantime? I'm scared...
title: Gestational Diabetes?? Oh no!
